name: Magic Run 'n' Gun
description:
Please read in-game instructions.

Gun down enemies with your magic gun staff. 

But be careful, you need to protect one of them, very important.

WASD or arrow keys to move. 

Aim with mouse and shoot with left click.

NOTE: The menu theme that is about 1 min 20 sec. You don't have to listen to it but I will note that it is there. 

ALL graphics and music were provided by me. Sound effects were made using JFXR.
